citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:00pm on
December 7th, 2022. The licensee was reached by phone and stated that he was 2 hours away, and that no one else was
available to accompany the inspectors on an inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:00pm on 
December 7th, 2022. The licensee was reached by phone and stated that he was 2 hours away, and that no one else was 
available to accompany the inspectors on an inspection. 
 
 
 
End Section
